safari-request-permissions-title-alt.message: The latest update of Adblock Plus requires some additional permissions to allow us to block more nuisance ads.

safari-request-permissions-instruction1.message: 1. Tap on the Review button at the top or the [[IMG:safari_menu_icon]] in the address bar

safari-request-permissions-note.message: Note we will not be accessing any sensitive information and only require these permissions to block ads and other elements.

safari-installed-page-title.message: Adblock Plus for Safari was enabled

safari-installed-desc.message: Open the app to adjust your settings and explore additional features that enhance your experience on Safari.

safari-enable-extension-title.message: Oops! It looks like the Safari extension isn’t enabled. Here’s how to set it up:

safari-enable-extension-instruction1.message: 1. Tap [[IMG:safari_menu_icon]] icon on the left side of the search field

safari-enable-extension-instruction3.message: 3. Tap the toggle to turn on Adblock Plus and tap Done
